whyEscrows.title: Why Escrows Matter
whyEscrows.description1: At its core, an escrow is a neutral and secure way to hold funds while something else happensâ€”whether it's transferring a house, delivering a product, or completing a project.
whyEscrows.description2: In traditional payment systems, trust is built through costly intermediaries, complex processes, and limited transparency. These barriers slow innovation, increase costs, and limit accessibility.
whyEscrows.description3: Trustless Work eliminates these inefficiencies, fostering trust through blockchain-powered automation, API-driven simplicity, and global accessibility.

smartEscrow.title: What does a Smart Escrow look like?
smartEscrow.description1: Our smart escrows are designed to be flexible, secure, and transparent. Each escrow has unique properties that define how it works and who can interact with it.
smartEscrow.description2: From the escrow ID to milestones and flags, every aspect is carefully designed to ensure trust and efficiency in your transactions.
smartEscrow.description3: Smart escrows can be configured for various use cases, from simple payments to complex multi-stage projects with multiple stakeholders.
